record.title: Machine learning of pyrite geochemistry reconstructs the multi-stage history of mineral deposits
record.subjects: Machine learning ; Random forest ; Support vector machine ; Pyrite ; Multi-stage genesis ; Keketale deposit
record.abstract: Highlights •Big balanced data using RF/SVM can identify the origins of minerals.•Pyrites at Keketale deposit are distinguished between early VMS and later orogenic types.•Machine learning revealed a two-stage ore-forming history of the Keketale deposit.•Machine learning methods can reconstruct complicated history of mineral deposits.
record.contributors: Yu, Pengpeng ; Liu, Yuan ; Wang, Hanyu ; Chen, Xi ; Zheng, Yi ; Cao, Wei ; Xiong, Yiqu ; Shan, Hongxiang
